dialogues.text: Hello there, young one. My name is Selwyn.
I have devoted my life to the studies of Water Magic. There are many mysteries surrounding the origins of magic in Myrinnia.
Come see me once you have learnt the other skills. I can help you master your first Ability.
If you'd like, I can get you started with Water Magic.
Alright. I can teach you your first ability.
'Mend Wounds' is a healing ability that will heal you for an initial amount, plus regenerate some additional health over time.
You must first put this ability in your active slots.
